We are searching for a Director of Software Engineering for an exciting start up in the histopathology space. This company is revolutionizing microscopic diagnoses. This role is focused on artificial intelligence - AI, and machine learning, ML models. The Director of Software Engineering will report directly to the company's CEO, and will be responsible for driving development of AI and ML products, setting and delivering strategic launch goals, "owning" the software development lifecycle. Please note, this role is hybrid and requires this person to be onsite at least 3-4 days per week. Relocation to the Los Angeles area is required by summer 2023.Requirements For The Director Of Software EngineeringMS; BS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, Software, Systems Engineering, or Biomedical Engineering.5+ years' experience in software development1+ years' experience in AI/ML models deployment, preferably computer vision modelsExperience defining complex software and system architectures, trade studies and analysis of alternatives, defining and implementing best practicesA strong background generating technical documentation including requirements, specifications, engineering reports, SOPsA track record of accomplishment developing and leading a high performance team of software developersExcellent communications skills, oral, written, presentationExposure to or familiarity with digital pathology or other medical imaging modalities and standards preferredExperience working on (SaMD) a software as a medical device preferredExperience with medical device new product launch preferredAn understanding of FDA, MDD quality systems including, ISO 13485 and FDA 21 CFR 820, IEC 62366 and FDA guidance on medical device usability engineeringOccupational Category: 5-1252 Software Developers
